issue.title: [Rust] ParquetFileArrowReader should be able to read empty parquet file without error
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8751](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8751). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Sometimes spark will write out parquet files with zero row groups, which will result in error if read using ParquetFileArrowReader.

It would be more convenient if ParquetFileArrowReader can support this edge-case out of the box.
